text.p: These are significant stories in the Nigerian press on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Renovation of burnt Ikeja (Lagos) telephone exchange may be completed by the end of next month.
- Investors say the cost of raising funds through capital markets is made too high by exorbitant charges imposed by the Securities and Exchange Commission and Nigerian Stock Exchange.
- Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation (NNPC) appeals to people not to sabotage oil installations in the Rivers State producing areas.
